question: Is this website for buying fireworks?
answer: No. This is a display-only catalog. To enquire about products or place an order, please use the WhatsApp button to contact us directly.

question: How do I place an order?
answer: Simply click the WhatsApp Enquiry button on any product or use the floating WhatsApp button. Our team will assist you with pricing, delivery, and order details.

question: Are there videos of the products?
answer: Yes! Most products have embedded YouTube videos showing the effects. Click 'Watch Video' on any product card to see the display.

question: Can I save my favorite products?
answer: Absolutely! Click the heart icon on any product to add it to your shortlist. You can view all favorites and share them via WhatsApp.

question: Do you deliver to my area?
answer: Contact us via WhatsApp to check delivery availability for your location. Our team will provide complete details about delivery options and timelines.

question: What about bulk or wholesale orders?
answer: We handle bulk orders and dealer partnerships. Visit the 'Bulk Orders' page or WhatsApp us directly for wholesale enquiries.

question: Are your products safe for kids?
answer: Many of our products are marked as 'Kids Friendly'. Always supervise children and follow safety instructions. Visit our Safety page for detailed guidelines.

question: Can I use this site as an app on my phone?
answer: Yes! This site is PWA-enabled. On Android or Chromium browsers, you can 'Add to Home Screen' and use it like a native app.
